DataElement.preferredName: Person Clinical Study Registration Or Treatment Begin Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: indicator related to a person being registered or having begun treatment as part of clinical trial, research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects, as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Clinical Study Registration Or Treatment Begin Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person being registered or having begun treatment as part of clinical trial, research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects, as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Clinical Study Registration Or Therapy Begin Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.:Or; used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Person Clinical Study Registration Or Treatment Begin Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: indicator for person clinical study registration and treatment beginning on clinical trial eligibility criteria.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient registered to
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient registered to or started treatment on the respective treatment trial

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
